pkgmetadata.longdescription: Importing Real-Time Thermo Cycler (qPCR) Data from RDML Format Files // Imports real-time thermo cycler (qPCR) data from Real- time PCR Data Markup Language (RDML) and transforms to the appropriate formats of the 'qpcR' and 'chipPCR' packages. Contains a dendrogram visualization for the structure of RDML object and GUI for RDML editing.
